alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:08AM MST until February 22 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. In Colorado, Northwest San Juan Mountains, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways with areas of blowing and heavy snowfall impacting visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
